promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young mythical monkey fire-type with white fur. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or monkey. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Flamomoke, a chibi young mythical monkey fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: fire-punch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word monkey or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, monkey-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: Flamomoke lazes in the sun during the day, exuding a heat aura from its fur. It uses this to ward off foes from its desert home.
